entry: The wind howls through the icy tundra, carrying with it a haunting melody. Your breaths come out in plumes of frost as you set foot into this frigid land.
investigate: "You find a set of tracks that appear to belong to a massive creature. They seem to be fresh
preview: and you're left wondering what kind of beast could brave this harsh environment."
column5: you spot what appears to be an aurora borealis. The lights dance and sway
column6: creating a breathtaking display that leaves you in awe."
column7: "You hear the howls of wolves in the distance
column8: a sound that makes you shiver. It's time to leave before they get too close."

entry: As you enter this frozen wonderland, you can't help but marvel at the massive glaciers that seem to stretch on for miles. You can almost hear the ice creaking beneath your feet.
investigate: "You stumble upon a pack of arctic foxes. They seem curious of you
preview: and you can't help but feel a sense of wonder as you watch them play."
leave: "The snow crunches beneath your feet as you make your way deeper into this frozen forest. The towering trees are coated in a layer of frost
column5: creating an eerie and beautiful landscape."
column7: you can feel the chill of night starting to set in. It's time to find shelter before the true cold sets in."

entry: The frigid air seems to bite at your skin as you venture deeper into this frozen desert. You can see the sun glinting off of snow dunes in the distance.
investigate: "You find yourself standing at the edge of a massive cliff
preview: peering out into the endless expanse of white. The beauty of this frigid wasteland leaves you breathless."
leave: "The silence of this frozen land is only broken by the occasional sound of snow being blown about by the wind. It's an eerie feeling
column7: you see what looks like a polar bear in the distance. It's time to move quickly before it notices you."

entry: You find yourself in a frozen valley, surrounded by jagged peaks and snow drifts. The silence here is absolute, save for the sound of your own breathing.
investigate: "As you move through the snow drifts
preview: you spot what appears to be the entrance to an ice cave. The possibility of treasure beckons
column6: you can see the hulking form of a woolly mammoth. It seems to be grazing on the sparse vegetation that grows here
column7: and you can't help but feel awestruck."
column9: you're struck by the beauty of the snow-covered landscape. You're hesitant to leave
column10: but you know that it's not safe to stay for long."
